description:
Command-line Git information tool

Onefetch is a command-line Git information tool written in Rust that displays project information and code statistics for a local Git repository directly to your terminal.
The tool is completely offline - no network access is required.
What's Changed
New Features
- add language support for Lean by @Kajiih in #1579
- support repos "without source code" by @o2sh in #1580
Chores
- improve error handling by @Mahdiglm in #1560
Bug Fixes
- remove extra line break by @o2sh in 886d942
New Contributors
- @Mahdiglm made their first contribution in #1560
- @Kajiih made their first contribution in #1579
Full Changelog: 2.24.0...2.25.0
